text: On 1 October 2012, two ferries collided off Yung Shue Wan, Lamma Island, Hong Kong. Since the day was the National Day of the People's Republic of China, one of the ships was headed for the commemorative firework display. 39 deaths were caused in the accident. == References == Category:2012 disasters Category:2010s in Hong Kong Category:2010s disasters in China Category:2012 in Asia
title: 2012 Lamma Island ferry collision
